adminServer.adminServerDisabled: true will disable admin server and related functionality [OPADM_DISABLED]

logger.directory: directory for the onprem admin server logs [OPADM_LOGS]

apiServer.altBroadcasterHost: alternate hostname for api -> broadcaster communication [CS_API_ALT_BROADCASTER_HOST]
apiServer.authOrigin: origin to use for third-party auth callbacks [CS_API_AUTH_ORIGIN]
apiServer.callbackEnvironment: allows for callbacks through VPN to developers' local servers [CS_API_CALLBACK_ENV]
apiServer.confirmCodeExpiration: how long a confirmation code remains valid (in millisecs, default = 1 week) [CS_API_CONFIRM_CODE_EXPIRATION]
apiServer.confirmationExpiration: how long a token for email confirmation remains valid (in millisecs, default = 1 day) [CS_API_CONFIRMATION_EXPIRATION]
apiServer.confirmationNotRequired: set to true to disable email confirmation [CS_API_CONFIRMATION_NOT_REQUIRED]
apiServer.disablePhoneHome: set to false to disable phone home reporting (license permitting) [CS_API_PHONE_HOME]
apiServer.dontWantAWS: set to true so API server will not use any AWS services [CS_API_DONT_WANT_AWS]
apiServer.forgotPasswordExpiration: how long a token for forgot-password remains valid (in millisecs, default = 1 day) [CS_API_FORGOT_PASSWORD_EXPIRATION]
apiServer.ignoreHttps: set to true to respond to http instead of https [CS_API_IGNORE_HTTPS]
apiServer.mockMode: for running tests on same host; nothing is saved to a database and PubNub is replaced by IPC [CS_API_MOCK_MODE]
apiServer.phoneHomeUrl: server-side endpoint for phone home data collection [CS_API_PHONE_HOME_URL]
apiServer.port: Network port for the api service [CS_API_PORT]
apiServer.publicApiUrl: public url to access the API server from beyond [CS_API_PUBLIC_URL]
apiServer.securePort: Secure network port for the api service [CS_API_SECURE_PORT]
apiServer.sessionAwayTimeout: how long before we call a user 'away' from keyboard (in millisecs) [CS_API_SESSION_AWAY_TIMEOUT]
apiServer.showConfig: print exported api configuration data to console [CS_API_SHOW_CFG]
apiServer.signupTokenExpiration: how long a signup token issued by the IDE for a user to signup on web remains valid (in millisecs, default = 10 min) [CS_API_SIGNUP_TOKEN_EXPIRATION]

codestreamBroadcaster.altApiHost: alternate hostname to use to make api requests [CS_BROADCASTER_ALT_API_HOST]
codestreamBroadcaster.host: hostname of the broadcaster service (from client point-of-view)
codestreamBroadcaster.ignoreHttps: set to true to respond to http instead of https [CS_BROADCASTER_IGNORE_HTTPS]
codestreamBroadcaster.port: Network port for the broadcaster service [CSSVC_BROADCASTER_PORT]

secrets.api: used to generate json web tokens for authentication tokens passed to the client [CSSVC_BROADCASTER_API_SECRET]
secrets.auth: used to privilege certain api server requests to the broadcaster service [CSSVC_BROADCASTER_AUTH_SECRET]

codestreamBroadcaster.securePort: Secure network port for the broadcaster service [CSSVC_BROADCASTER_SECURE_PORT]
codestreamBroadcaster.showConfig: print exported broadcaster configuration data to console [CS_BROADCASTER_SHOW_CFG]

email.emailTo: Divert all email to this address
email.notificationInterval: Frequency email is generated (in millisecs, default = 30 secs)
email.replyToDomain: email domain for routing replies back to codestream
email.senderEmail: all generated emails will be sent as this user
email.supportEmail: support email address to include on email and forms
email.suppressEmails: Stop all email from being sent

NodeMailer.secure: use secure transport when sending mail

inboundEmailServer.inboundEmailDirectory: new email files will be delivered to this directory by the mail agent [CS_MAILIN_INBOUND_EMAIL_DIR]
inboundEmailServer.inboundEmailDisabled: true will disable inbound email processing [CS_MAILIN_INBOUND_EMAIL_DISABLED]
inboundEmailServer.processDirectory: email files will be moved to this directory for processing
inboundEmailServer.showConfig: print exported inbound email configuration data to console [CS_MAILIN_SHOW_CFG]
inboundEmailServer.tempAttachmentDirectory: attachments in incoming emails will be stored temporarily here

<appProvider>.appClientId: MS Azure DevOps API client Id [CSSVC_DEVOPS_CLIENT_ID]

<appProvider>.botAppId: Sharing MS Teams Bot App Id [CSSVC_MSTEAMS_BOT_APP_ID]
<appProvider>.botAppPassword: Sharing MS Teams Bot App Password [CSSVC_MSTEAMS_BOT_APP_PASS]

<appProvider>.interactiveComponentsEnabled: configures Slack app interactive callback capabilities

outboundEmailServer.showConfig: print exported outbound email configuration data to console [CS_OUTBOUND_EMAIL_SHOW_CFG]

mongo.url: optional override for mongo connect string [CS_OUTBOUND_EMAIL_MONGO_URL]

stripe.publishableKey: stripe payment key visible to clients

sharedGeneral.installationId: unique identifier for the onprem installation [CSSVC_INSTALLATION_ID]
sharedGeneral.runTimeEnvironment: run-time environment (local, onprem, prod, qa, pd, ...) [CSSVC_ENV]

sharedSecrets.confirmationCheat: for bypassing email confirmation, used for unit testing [CSSVC_CONFIRMATION_CHEAT_CODE]
sharedSecrets.mail: requests to the API server fromm the inbound email server provide this secret. This prevents outside clients from simulating inbound emails [CSSVC_INBOUND_EMAIL_SECRET]
sharedSecrets.subscriptionCheat: allows unregistered users to subscribe to their me-channel, for testing emails [CSSVC_SUBSCRIPTION_CHEAT_CODE]
sharedSecrets.telemetry: for accessing the api prior to authentication (pre-auth secret) [CSSVC_PRE_AUTH_SECRET]

ssl.requireStrictSSL: require client-side strict SSL certificate verification

<certId>.privateCA: true indicates certificate signed by private CA

segment.webToken: segment web token for the web app

s3.disableSse: disable server-side-encryption when copying images to S3 [CSSVC_S3_DISABLE_SSE]
s3.publicUrl: public-facing url and prefix for serving images from S3 [CSSVC_S3_PUBLIC_URL]
s3.stripKeyPrefixFromUrl: determines if file urls saved in mongo include the keyPrefix [CSSVC_S3_STRIP_KEY_PREFIX]
